website_summaries.verdict: Halo’s recipe of sustainably caught ocean whitefish, GMO-free vegetables, and easily digested whole proteins is an all-around healthy and tasty canned meal.
pros: Ocean whitefish, chicken liver, and chicken are the first 3 ingredients
Includes healthy ingredients like sweet potatoes and spinach
cons: Some hardcore carnivore kitties may try to eat around this recipe’s veggies

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Product, NOT GREAT Supplier
customer_reviews.text: GREAT Product, NOT GREAT Supplier. Just don't order this from Amazon. There's something about this product that's different from when I buy it at a pet store - this one is mushy and strange and my cat won't eat it. But when i get it from Petco it's a good texture, doesn't look strange, and he eats it. No clue what that's about but be aware. It is a great product otherwise and my very picky cat loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Hermione

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS product -- do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love this food -- it's the only one they happily eat. However, for the third time, I received dented cans that contained tainted product. The can on the right is a normal one, the others are 2 of the 8 cans that were dented. I immediately noticed the food was spoiled, but my husband or a pet sitter probably wouldn't have, and my cats would be sick or dead now. I have never had a dented can when purchasing from Petco, so i don't understand why this is a repeated problem here. I cancelled my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Amy G

customer_reviews.title: This is Lily's favorite. She eats one can per day
customer_reviews.text: This is Lily's favorite. She eats one can per day. She threw up and having diarrhea on many other brands and anything with chicken. We switch her food between Halo canned turkey duck and turkey giblets with fish oil added in her food. Her fur is getting softer and her tummy and diarrhea issue has improved since starting her halo diet. Thanks to halo.
customer_reviews.author: Yun

customer_reviews.title: DAMN GOOD STINKA'FISSHH
customer_reviews.text: This has been the ONLY wet food my fur babies will nom. They've been privy to MANY different types, but this is Their Nom. I had been purchasing it elsewhere, but let's face it, it's not "cheap". Although I'd read other Amazon reviews stating that what Amazon offers is "fake" or "old", I decided to give it a try. What I received from Amazon was PERFECT. ZERO DENTS. NOT "DRY" OR "WEIRD". I'm sorry that other people had a crap experience, but mine has been just fine (so far), and lemme tell ya, WAAAY more cost effective when you're tryin'na feed your kitties some damn good stinka'fisshh.
customer_reviews.author: Mum of Mr. Roona & Mittens Anne

customer_reviews.title: Vomit
customer_reviews.text: Just like the others I couldnt figure out why my cat was sneezing or vomiting little by little, I noticed it would be an hour or so after eating this food so I thought hmm maybe its the wet food. Surely enough on the day I gave her a small spoonful of this food she would vomit about an hour after. Done feeding this to my kitty.
customer_reviews.author: SSP

customer_reviews.title: Salmon pate
customer_reviews.text: This is the pâté version of the Halo salmon food. It is very smooth and high quality. There is also a non-pate version so be mindful of which you'd prefer. It's the only food our cat will eat, and after a month her fur is much softer and she's gained good weight back. Thanks to Lillian Bubbles for recommending Halo to us! Good job, Bub! 🐈
customer_reviews.author: E Arroway

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad fulfillment
customer_reviews.text: My picky kitty who had spent her whole life on dry food likes this, which was a huge relief as I had to switch her for medical reasons. It's low carb enough for a diabetic cat and she rejected the specialty diabetic cat foods, so we're sticking with this. But Amazon is pretty terrible about sending this. I just received a shipment where one can had burst open in transit. So, basically, I got rotting meat in the mail. Not cool, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: Halo seems to be the best quality wet cat food i can find. The whitefish flavor is okay. My cats' favorite is the salmon...really mushy and great for older felines (no chewing required!). The chicken stew is their next favorite, but they like them all. Halo uses whole food only--no ground meal. It is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Country girl

customer_reviews.title: This brand is not as good as it sounds
customer_reviews.text: Our cat has been vomiting from this food for 3 days. He cannot handle anything with chicken, turkey and now not even salmon. These foods are very toxic. We are left to feed him only grain free beef and pet food from New Zealand, which is very expensive. This brand is not as good as it sounds.
customer_reviews.author: redlotus

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it. I used to feed him purina stuff. I would usually give him a half can and save the rest in the fridge with the silicon top, and it would get as dry as sand the next day. I think it’s because it contained too much wheat and corn flour which isn’t something a cat’s supposed to eat. It’s very apparent that halo uses different ingredients and looks yummy even from my view lol. I love this product and probably would never go back to purina just to save a few bucks. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bryner

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes this food and I like the quality of HALO grain free cat food
customer_reviews.text: As written in the headline, I like the quality of HALO grain free wet cat food. The cat likes the food, because it is grain free she does not get sick after eating, and our vet recommends feeding wet cat food with a small amount of dry food.
customer_reviews.author: LaLise F

customer_reviews.title: Love the giblets
customer_reviews.text: I bought Halo canned turkey duck and turkey giblets. Lily, almost two years old, prefers the turkey duck more for the first week of feeding but adapted to the giblets flavor in about a week. The texture is a little watery compare to normal pate. I can pure the liquid out to mix with her fish oil im her plate before putting in the solid meat. Lily has a very sensitive tummy and throw up or having loose stool on many other brands and anything with chicken. She likes the two flavors from Halo and is getting healthier day by day. Thank you Halo.
customer_reviews.author: Yun

customer_reviews.title: “Mommy finally found my favorite food!”😻
customer_reviews.text: My very finicky cat Loves this! Due to her illness, I had to find a healthier food with no chicken in it - difficult, as chicken is in most wet foods. I’m so happy that she continually enjoys this, far more than her previous (less healthy) diet:)!
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Trusted Brand
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but healthy ingredients. One of three cats we own kept having recurring UTI infections. That is until I did some research on causes and started to feed her Halo brand . I'd rather spend more on food to keep her healthy and feeling good over being sick, spending it on medications, and a vet bill. For years now, this is the only brand we have been feeding ours cats. I left the same review for the Halo dry food as I bought both at the same time and always feed cats both wet and dry food everyday.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food, and I'm happy knowing it has good ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: skye mach

customer_reviews.title: New Life for an Old Cat
customer_reviews.text: My older cat had constant intestinal problems. He was often throwing up the food he ate. I read about grain free foods and I read some recommendations about this food and tried it. He hasn't thrown up in a long time. He's put weight back on, his overall appearance is better and he's more frisky once again. This food worked for us. Our cats seem to like the Turkey and Duck better than the Chicken, however.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this, they wake me up when it's not out of the can and waiting for them. They generally do like canned food, but I decided to get better quality cat food, can't believe the difference, gave them a can of the old kind (cheap aldi canned food) just to check it out and they ate it but not with the same eagerness they eat this. They also love the duck kind. Wish it was cheaper, but will probably continue to indulge them. I have noticed a difference in their poo too! (Not as much and not as stinky) and with 3 cats, need all the help we can get with that department.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our picky cat devours this pate. Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat will eat birds, mice, crickets, you name it. Actual cat food though? Nah. He may sniff, he may nibble... But he DEVOURS Halo. I'm not sure what kind of kitty crack you're putting in here, but it's working. His coat is shiny and his weight has returned. He meows like a train horn for each meal and then sleeps off his post-feast coma every time. Gracias.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Now More Watery!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what crowd Halo was trying to please but since the reformulation there is less substance and more water/oil in each can. Actual solid part of the food sits 1/4 to 1/2 inch away from the sides of the can. I can't seem to manage to open it without spilling liquid all over the place. Cat still eats it, but she was already a good water drinker so no added benefit there for us.
customer_reviews.author: Superman

customer_reviews.title: Cat Hasn't Approved It Yet
customer_reviews.text: Cats can be so picky. The ingredient list on this cat food suggests a good quality product. One of my cats will eat a small amount of it, but the other one just scrapes the floor with a paw trying to bury it! You might have better luck with your cats. UPDATE: after being served this cat food for one meal every other day, "Mr. Picky" began to eat some of it. Not a whole meal, but a few good bites. So persistence may pay off. I upgraded my rating to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Fixed the problem.....
customer_reviews.text: I had a long time problem with my Ragdoll getting constipated or runny stools from the same food. I tried one can of this for him and it made me a purchaser. Been buying this for over 6 months and will not feed him anything else. I love ordering from Amazon...always delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: Calindachris

customer_reviews.title: We struck-out with this cat food!
customer_reviews.text: Very discouraging outcome. My old guy (15) has diabetes, and I've tried Royal Canine diabetic cat food (that he walked away from), and this stuff that he ate on the first day but that was it! I don't understand what's in regular wet cat food that both my cats love, and what's in the good stuff, that my old guy hates. I'm sure it's a fine product, but it's expensive, and didn't do my cat any good. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cats did not like it
customer_reviews.text: 2 of my 3 cats just would not eat this, no matter what I did...heated it up a bit, even added a dollop of baby food (which they love) on top to get them to try it, but they would not. I know it is a healthy option, but I ended up throwing away a lot of it and going back to their previous food.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Butterfly Effect

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cats!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this! My 16 yr old had pancreous problems... but was throwing up the lite S.D. food the vet recommended. So I got a couple cans of the stew first, which he loved, and wow... no throw up!! He didn't like the vege's so much, so tried the pate', and they both love it! He's actually gained weight back and is doing great! The pate' is firmer and more like meat, which they like... not so watery like the stew, so seems to go farther. So happy I tried this! My kitties are happy too!
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Happy boys = happy mommy!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this much more than Spot's Stew. The pate version doesn't have whole vegetable chunks, so i know they're actually eating the whole can, rather than eating everything except a bowl of left-over peas, impeccably separated from the good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Purchased again because the local stores were out, and yet again, the food is dried out, and my cats won’t eat it. Another round of wasted money. The last three cases I’ve ordered have been dark and dried out with chunks of white hard pieces. Prior to ordering here I would buy from Petco. I’ve gone back to purchasing from Petco again. The local purchase is in light color, moist and no hard pieces. I don’t recommend purchasing from here.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hart

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly my picky cat loves it! After 2 years of searching food without chicken that he will eat it and in decent price - i finally found it! He loves this turkey&duck pate! Thank you HALO!
customer_reviews.author: Even_3

customer_reviews.title: No throwing up!
customer_reviews.text: My cat's issue was throwing up several times a day and sometimes before she leaves food bowl. Vet put her on prescription food z/d and it helped a lot, but wanted a healthier and less expensive diet. I mixed the dry halo 50/50 and fed the wet Halo food 100% and she never threw up. She has been on it 30 days now and doing really well. Her fur even feels like kitten fur again (she 12) and she loved the taste of both immediately. I so recommend Halo foods.
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Quality healthy food
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched to Halo for a better price. I like that the food is grain free and contains high quality protein. I gave it only 4 stars because my cats report that it isn't as tasty as what they had before.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Our cats won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: We have three cats, and none of them will eat this. We have the same trouble with most "healthy" cat food, so I can't say this one is worse than others. Considering Ellen's endorsement, I was hoping for better luck with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine E

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: On the pricey side, but this is the stuff your cats need. No fillers or rendered animals parts. It’s a good brand. The product is consistently made well. Now amazon has to figure how to send with denting all the cans.
customer_reviews.author: Penguin60

customer_reviews.title: Cat has so much energy!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few grain-free/high meat content wet foods (Wellness, Blue, Nutro) and this is the only one that my cat loves. He's been eating it for a few months now and there's a huuuge difference in his energy levels (he's 13 years old) as compared to his previous "junk food" diet of Friskies and Iams. He now eats half this and half Wellness Core dry food. He acts like a kitten, always wanting to play and running all over the house. His litter box trips are much cleaner and very solid, like he's absorbing all nutrients. I'm very pleased! The price is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlit

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My three cats love this food. I rotate between three flavors, Spots Stew, Spots Pate and Abound turkey. No more throwing up from any of the cats. They also have lost excess weight since eliminating almost all dry food. We do use a little as a treat or to get them to come when called. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Californialove

customer_reviews.title: Salmon Recipe Changed??
customer_reviews.text: This last case of Salmon cat food is different in color and texture than my previous orders. I’m concerned because my cats will not eat it. I’m using other food in the meantime and waiting to see if I wait a few weeks perhaps they will like it again. Just hope this batch is not bad or that the recipe has changed. I may cancel the next shipment until I figure this out.
customer_reviews.author: Prajana

customer_reviews.title: Good PATE consistency
customer_reviews.text: Kitty (age 18) likes it. Doesn't go nuts for it, but she eats it completely after a couple of visits to the bowl (and she gets small portions). For urinary tract health, I moosh it up with a little water before serving so that sometimes it's almost soup. She likes that a lot better. It's very pate (no chunks) in consistency, except for the occasional green pea. I ordered as a subscription, but I'm going back to a previous brand she likes even better.
customer_reviews.author: DeaB

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this and it has changed her mangled ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this and it has changed her mangled hair to a lovely coat. She went from a mangled, feral, outdoor skittish , stray cat, to an indoor, pampered princess and this food has changed her coat to a silky, smooth, shampoo hair model cat. Thumbs up for sure.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Try it  for 14 days if they don’t love it you can return it!
customer_reviews.text: The label says it all.! All meat no rendered animal products greens no grains, and this particular can is for indoor cats of which I have two. My cats love it, there’s never any waste. Non-GMO, plus if they don’t like it you can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Schuring

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about the Halo brand cat food, it really is top quality. It costs more than other brands, but my cat digests it without issue and her coat is much silkier and skin is healthy. For one cat, a small dollop at breakfast and dinner along her dry food, a can lasts 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for multiple cats but 2 of them seem to like it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good cat food but it is too expensive for multiple cats on a daily basis. I am not sure how well it works long time but the ingredients seem good and my cats did eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Bklyn Lady

customer_reviews.title: High quality cat food
customer_reviews.text: This food is made from high quality ingredients, and she eats it readily, so there are fewer vet visits due to a high grade product making the price worth it.
customer_reviews.author: albert w.

customer_reviews.title: My cat wasn't having it.....
customer_reviews.text: I have never considered my cat a picky eater. She has always eaten anything I put in front of her and has historically been obsessed with Tuna. I decided to give this canned food a try since she's been struggling more and more with hairballs. I've read grain free can help a lot with that. She won't touch it. She'll smell it and lick it a little and then walk away. I tried for a couple of days and she honestly went hungry. I wouldn't recommend this food at all.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeGirl68

customer_reviews.title: Cat absolutely refused to eat this
customer_reviews.text: Although I thought this was a great quality cat food, my 5 year old cat had other ideas. He not only refused to eat it, but dragged area rugs from other rooms into the kitchen to "cover it". Apparently the motion to "bury" inadequately expressed is dissatisfaction. I will pass this on to another cat owner. On a positive note, the case arrived with all cans dent-free and totally undamaged. Very happy with the shipping and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Robin G

customer_reviews.title: This stuff vs Purina my cats  did not act like there was a huge difference between one or the other.
customer_reviews.text: My big mistake here was thinking that I was buying a seafood variety of pate cat food. My cat I hate this particular flavor regardless the brand so I don't think in any case they would've said thank you for getting me this. So, I can't recommend it because I'm still trying to get my cats to eat it. My loss.
customer_reviews.author: C.A. DavisTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: cats think this is OK
customer_reviews.text: My cats can take this or leave it. If I feed it two days in a row, they leave it. So, I get cases of various cat foods and mix them up for kitties day by day. Mine are getting older now, so they want more canned food and are starting not to like the kibble so much. The quality of the food seems good, but not something they just scramble over to eat. Maybe they should test flavors on my cats ;)
customer_reviews.author: VeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Food
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food. You might think it is expensive, but the better the quality of the food they healthier your pets will be. My cats are 15 and 17 they have not been to the vet for anything except wellness checks and vaccines.
customer_reviews.author: njh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Affordable Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: Our cats actually demand to be fed and wait expectantly for their food. Both seem to be extremely healthy and our larger cat is slimmed down now but still extremely active. Both cats eat less now even though we also provide dry cat food they can eat at will. The food does not smell bad either, which is a plus. I did a lot of research on cat foods before buying this and am happy our cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ponkow

customer_reviews.title: Rave reviews from my four feline babies!
customer_reviews.text: 16 paws up for this food... My four cats love many of the Halo Spot's cat food and this is no exception. I decided to try the Turkey and Duck, just as a way to add some variety and they LOVE LOVE LOVE this food and it was gone in no time. The kitties also like the salmon, white fish and lamb recipes. A little pricey, but you cannot go wrong with Halo Spot's cat food!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn N

customer_reviews.title: It's real fish - what's not to like?!
customer_reviews.text: On behalf of the three cats actually eating this - YUM! The quality is there, and so is the flavor. I went to a pet boutique and bought one of just about every non grain-centric canned cat food they had. I saved the labels with notes I had written so I could order in bulk later. Only a couple of varieties were as quickly devoured as this one, and I bought cases - rotating between the brands. Cats are finicky, and yours may not love this one, but start with a can and see.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline R.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it and it's not full of horrible ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: Overall excellent product. Cats actually eat this one and the ingredients aren't horrible. The only downside is occasionally I get a can with mold growth in it.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Only 12 cans?  My mistake!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice that this was only 12 cans!! Can't believe I paid this much for a brand I never heard of before. Mistakenly thought it was 24 cans. My cat loves the label, not so much the food.
customer_reviews.author: M. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My big, sweet cat loves this. I was so happy to find that the little research I did lead me to this food choice. My cat wasn't looking well & had slightly high blood sugars. Soon after feeding him this and the grain free dry food exclusively he was doing great and looking super. His coat is better than ever. Before feeding him this he was developing bald spots & looked sickly. Happy kitty, me too!
customer_reviews.author: tina t.

customer_reviews.title: Cat won't have anything to do with it
customer_reviews.text: Good ingredients and no horrid smell but my indoor cat will not eat it. I even sacrificed a can of salmon thinking if I mixed it with the cat food he might eat it but no.
customer_reviews.author: Grandavia

customer_reviews.title: the cats love it, and Halo is one of the safest ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually, the cats love it, and Halo is one of the safest and best lines of pet food- all natural ingredients, no corn or other harsh grains and very, very few recalls.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Put my old cat back on his feet
customer_reviews.text: My cat has advanced hyperthyroidism. He nearly died after I went out of town and an eager caregiver overdid the catnip, causing massive constipation. He lost so much weight that he looked terrible. It's hard to put weight back on a cat that has hyperthryoidism, even if it's fairly well under control, but after I put him on this canned food, he regained all his weight. It's good healthy muscle. At age 14, he looks about 7 or 8 years old. I'm delighted. He eats a can a day and also a good quality dry food.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Price to high with Carrageenan one of first ingredients. I feed to my cat because he is nine months, tried switching, threw up. Once he is older if they don't take this out will try switching again. The only flavor he likes is pate chicken. Hard to get in store. Always out, so I ordered 3 cases on line. If not for bad ingredient would be worth it to pay more for other healthy. Also, the chicken, not page had carrot pieces and peas. Cat didn't like.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Arnone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this cat food and pet stores don’t sell large quantities of this flavor, so happy amazon has it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bethke

customer_reviews.title: 2 Thumbs down or in my case 12 paws
customer_reviews.text: I usually get this brand from Sprouts and the cats like it a lot. But this whitefish recipe is a total loser. NONE of the cats like this and I have easy feeders!!! I'm sticking to buying from the store. At least then you have return options.
customer_reviews.author: namb

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible cat food! Cats won’t go near it. I taste test all of my cats wet foods and this stuff made me vomit. Stay away from it!
customer_reviews.author: Alan McDonald

customer_reviews.title: my kitten took to this food right away
customer_reviews.text: The kitten loved it, but my older black cat wasn't so keen on it. I mixed it with some food that he loves (Earthborn) and now he loves this, too. I generally mix this with the Earthborn chicken and both kitties eat it up. I prefer the pate to the stew because I have to stir up the stew until none of the veggies are visible before they will eat it. I have not seen any vomiting or diarrhea since they've been eating this food.
customer_reviews.author: K. Walter

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this flavor.
customer_reviews.text: My cats totally love this food and practically beg for it. Very satisfied with the nutritional content and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, grain-free, but a bit too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Our male Russian Blue Fur cat (7 years) loves this stuff. It's grain-free which is very good for him because he will sometimes throw up grainy foods apparently. I guess because of allergies. The only thing is the price. I can go to Whole Foods and get larger 8oz. cans for $0.99 each, grain-free, organic, with decent ingredients. Even with Amazon Prime shipping it's not worth it to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Wholesome, healthy ingredients that cats like.
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best, high quality ingredients cat food. My cat won't eat anything else....but you know how cats are.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: My diabetic 16 year old cat loves this food. She is on a "Catkins" diet due to her condition so this high protein food is perfect for her. HALO Customer Service is AMAZING too. I recently had an issue with an order I received and HALO immediately sent me a replacement case and picked up my original case from me. They made it ridiculously easy to work with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nerd Alert

customer_reviews.title: My two cats love Halo Spot's Pate
customer_reviews.text: My two cats love Halo Spot's Pate. After doing much research and trying to find a decent and healthy food for my babies, I was so happy to find a place where I could get a better deal than in the local pet stores! Great product that I trust. Shipping was quick, too! My cats say thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: The cats LOVE this.
customer_reviews.text: High quality food - Halo never disappoints. The cats love this and the canned turkey (as well as the dry). Halo/Spot's Stew is more expensive but very worth it. You pay either more now, or more later (in vet bills). Halo's food is made in America and has strict quality controls. One of the only safe foods left to feed your furbabies.
customer_reviews.author: Paws Worldwide

customer_reviews.title: Cat food
customer_reviews.text: High in protein & minimal fillers, but my cats do t like this too much
customer_reviews.author: Rudy R.

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: I have an aging, formerly obese cat (thought it was a dog and ate like one of our labs!). Noticing that he was starting to limp a little from his joints being stressed, we put him on a diet. Tried all sorts of wet food that weren't grain free (the typical "good" store brands, PetGuard, etc.). He did poorly on all of them until we tried a grain free. We've gone from using Athenae to only Halo's. It's expensive but worth it. He doesn't eat nearly so much, and looks great. He's down to a "normal" weight for his size. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Fuji Diamond

customer_reviews.title: I have 6 cats and they all  love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 elderly cats with eating problems and it is easy for them to eat (pate) the 4 younger ones like it too, the bowl is always licked clean. When they hear the can pop open they all come running. They all seem healthy and happy on it, it digests easily for them, no big stinky litter box smells, large things to scoop or gas problems so I like it. Everyone has nice healthy soft furry coats, seem great!
customer_reviews.author: TadpOLLs

customer_reviews.title: very good catfood
customer_reviews.text: This is one cat food that all my cats seem to enjoy. Ingredient list looks good and although on the pricy side is a healthy treat.
customer_reviews.author: swaizel

customer_reviews.title: Another Win for Halo Pet Food
customer_reviews.text: I feed both my dogs (Golden Retrievers) and my cats (two 3-year-old Calicos) Halo foods. This wet cat food is excellent. I really like this pureed version, because my picky, picky felines tend to eat around some of the vegetables in Halo Spot's Stew. I am hoping that this pureed version will soon be available in the smaller sized cans. Fingers crossed. Halo pet foods have always been wonderful for all my pets, and my Calicos have never eaten anything else. They are happy, strong and very healthy. I can honestly recommend any Halo products in general and this canned version in particular.
customer_reviews.author: CindiMc

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love this food. We have using this brand wet food for five years. Multiple flavors. We have bought 3oz and 5oz cans
customer_reviews.author: Fawad Afzal

customer_reviews.title: Small black dots of mold
customer_reviews.text: Cans were speckled with small dots of black mold. 2nd time in a row my order was like this. When purchased at local store, cans were fine. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Carson R.

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this is a great product, but my cat is so fussy
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a great product, but my cat is so fussy. She wouldn't eat it. She only likes one brand and one variety. I can't get her to eat anything else.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Jane

customer_reviews.title: Qualify food but cat doesn't eat all
customer_reviews.text: My cats eat this and it seems like a good food but they never eat all of it. I rotate what I feed my cats and I have this on occasion. But it seems it doesn't matter what portion I feed they leave a little.
customer_reviews.author: AKM

customer_reviews.title: They all like this. They don't get hairballs or upset tummies
customer_reviews.text: Have 6 cats ranging from 10 mos to 10 years. They all like this. They don't get hairballs or upset tummies. I always add some extra water to make sure they get enough liquid in their diet.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kardys

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks good smelled good but my cats wouldn't eat it. I guess just like most kids they prefer junk food.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Aaahhh. Found the food he likes and it's healthy ...
customer_reviews.text: Aaahhh. Found the food he likes and it's healthy! I have been trying to find a low ash, low carb, medium fat food that my cat will eat and finally have it. Sheesh!!! Thanks Halo
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Janes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent food for cats
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our cat who is twenty one years old. He was having a problem throwing up and we tried changing his food several times with the food store brands. However, he loves this food and has not thrown up in the seven days that he has been eating it . It has flax in it for fiber and vegetables and meat. A combination that he seems to love.
customer_reviews.author: Inquisitive

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it, expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it. Good on everyone’s tummies.. even the most sensitive one. Good with change over from old food; no issues. Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriends' Orange Tabby loves this food. He's much healthier and active now. It had been very difficult previously to find a consistent food for him. He just loves this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Runny pate
customer_reviews.text: I think a couple cans in this batch were mislabeled and might have been stew because they were very runny, not the usual pate consistency. Never had this happen before.
customer_reviews.author: SweetVaBreeze

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Ingredients with 100% Satisfaction or Your Money Back
customer_reviews.text: This has a great ingredient list; however, my cat wouldn’t touch it. I appreciate the 100% Money Back guarantee, which Halo stood behind. A little added gravy or aspic may help palatability.
customer_reviews.author: Ayervedic

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick. I hunch these cans were ...
customer_reviews.text: Made my cat sick. I hunch these cans were taken off the market and re-sold via amazon because there is something wrong with them. Wish I could get my money back. If you care about your cat, don't purchase this product here.
customer_reviews.author: My honest opinion

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot off research and this is supposed to be a high quality cat food. For some reason my kitten would not eat this food. Things happen. Only reason I give 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it.  Very healthy.  5 Stars.
customer_reviews.text: My cats adore this wet food. Like most cat foods, the smell is intense and awful. It reminds me of the vienna sausages a kid would bring to lunch when I was in middle school. The ingredients in this food are superb. Grain-free is the best diet for cats. 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: aurora432

customer_reviews.title: Cat food
customer_reviews.text: High in protein and minimal fillers but my cats don’t like as much
customer_reviews.author: Rudy R.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy cat food
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was concerned about feeding my cat a healthier diet
customer_reviews.author: Judith Tanielian

customer_reviews.title: Wish my cats liked it!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a good quality food, but for some reason my cats don't seem to care for it. I feed a few ferals, so it won't go to waste; but I normally don't buy food at this price for the feral cats.
customer_reviews.author: Colene

customer_reviews.title: Halo is one of the best foods for a finicky
customer_reviews.text: Halo is one of the best foods for a finicky, elderly cat. If you have a cat who is not eating well, try one of the Halo varieties.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheels

customer_reviews.title: My feline's fav!
customer_reviews.text: This is my cats favorite food and the only flavor she'll eat. I like that it's all natural with high quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Dean James Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Above average quality canned food
customer_reviews.text: I prefer home prepared but if I've run out, I use this. I'd give it 4 stars if it was certified GMO free and 5 stars if it was organic. The original "Spots Stew" was supposed to be made from human grade ingredients and actually looked like chicken stew when you opened the can. Now everything is ground together and it is hard to decipher what is in it
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves Halo Holistic wet cat food. She goes nuts when we open the can for the food. It's great quality and apparently tastes pretty great for cats. I feel good I am giving her the best.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D. Keenan

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My cats go extremely nuts over this food over and over again. We only feed wet food as a treat to them on a weekly basis and they absolutely love it. When I open a can it doesn't smell bad at all and smells like I could eat it! In addition my cats all come running! This food is a real treat to them since they now beg for it over their dry food!
customer_reviews.author: J. Geiling

customer_reviews.title: It was good. My kids loved it. But made their stomach’s a little upset
customer_reviews.text: It was good. My kids loved it. But made their stomach’s a little upset
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Cats
customer_reviews.text: My kitty’s love the turkey giblets cat food by Halo they have it twice a day as long as i don’t run out so I have to keep plenty of it on hand since they are finicky eaters 🐱🐱🐱🐈
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer. Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, Grain Free, & Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: My cat can't get enough of this food! This is a very high quality, natural grain free cat food. If your cat has a sensitive stomach like my cat does, you may want to try this. The food is easily digestible. I've tried many types of cat food and this is worth the price. He loves the taste and licks his dish clean. It is very fishy smelling though, just a warning :-)
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Their coats look great, and the vet loves how healthy they are
customer_reviews.text: My cats no longer get upset stomachs, nor do they get pooty. Their coats look great, and the vet loves how healthy they are. Great food!
customer_reviews.author: Amara

customer_reviews.title: Bowl licking good.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it doesn't have all the grains and additives that most cat food has. Only one of my two cats insists on a dab of canned cat food and she licks her little dish clean every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Tundra

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but our cats were “meh” about it
customer_reviews.text: My cats were not impressed. I think they like cheap eats.
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wet Cat Food (pate)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 17 year old kitty cat. He gobbled every morsel off the plate! No strong odor & provides a good hearty meal for felines.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Gal

product_meta.title: Halo Grain Free Natural Wet Cat Food, Indoor Recipe Pate, 5.5-Ounce Can (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:WhitefishHalo uses real WHOLE meat, poultry, or fish, and NO "meat meal" of ANY kind in our natural cat food. Our grain free indoor cat food has essential fatty acids to protect house cats’ skin and coat from the effects of HVAC systems, and keep them at a healthy weight. We also have cat food options for other special diets, including kitten food, sensitive stomach cat food, and senior cat food. At Halo, WHOLE Makes a Whole Lot of Difference is the philosophy that drives our holistic approach to ingredient sourcing, recipes, nutritional value, the welfare of ALL animals, and our overall mission to change the way companion animals are fed and farm animals are raised…for the better!

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Compare: whole Whitefish, never any Rendered "meal" Like 'fish meal' Or 'Chicken meal'
Highly digestible grain free wet cat Food with the aroma and taste cats love plus the Benefit of added hydration
Grain free indoor cat food made with whole Whitefish and non-GMO vegetables
Essential fatty acids support healthy skin and coat
No artificial colors or flavors, no preservatives of any kind, BPA free cans

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
